text: Omurumwa ubasoomelanga tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye tsinoosinjia tsirusia balia abasuubila mana nibakhola amalayi mushilima nitsibara mubulafu, ne usuubila khu Nyasaye mana nakhola amalayi alamwinjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburangamwo emialo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, toto Nyasaye alaba amuhelesiyie omukabo omulayi muno
